title: The game crashed in ranked match
body: The Game Crashed In The Ranked Match And I Got 20 min Ban and i reported the bug 3 times Any Help ?

replies.body: Hey there, based on the info it sounds like you're getting bugsplats in game.  This can happen if your drivers, game files, or even hardware is acting up.  I don't recommend queuing up to games for now until this is fixed up.  In the meantime, run through the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot and test it out in a custom game to make sure everything is squared away.  I hope that helps!
And The Ban Can You Unban Me I Didnt do any thing to get ban

Yeah, getting a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) as a result sucks but we aren't able to remove it.  :(  Even though it wasn't intentional, the system treats all leaves equally because it still causes other players a negative experience too.  Your best bet is to resolve the crashing issue and play to complete the required games.
